name: Gyrograde
description:
A game for the 2020 VimJam, collectables with a theme of "There and back". Play as a robot collecting upgrades scattered throughout the world. Use those upgrades to swap out your move set, but beware, you can only upgrade at the one upgrade station found in the world!

Start without the ability to jump and work your way up to dashing into enemies!

Find various secrets found throughout the world through hidden cave systems and underwater chasms.
